content.rendered:
🏙️РОСКОШНЫЙ FIVE-STAR BEACHFRONT HOTEL

GENERAL INFORMATION

🔹Total area: 8000 m2

🔹Number of houses: 3

🔹Number of apartments: 328

MANHATTAN Oasis Home MMT is a new large-scale resort complex, located on the beachfront in Morphou Bay in the Gaziveren area of North Cyprus. Indeed, has an ideal location, in a sparsely populated, ecologically impeccable place, which is one of the reasons why many people wishing to buy property in Cyprus, decided to buy it here. The complex is located right by the beautiful sandy beach, a short walk from the center of Gaziveren. Gaziveren is a picturesque town in the northern part of the island, where you can find many stores, cafes and restaurants. You can also buy everything you need for your daily needs in the nearby town of Lefke.

Our company has been implementing projects in resort and urban areas for 19 years and has a portfolio of more than 30 completed projects in Turkey. We carefully study each location, finishing material, the latest technological solutions and scientific achievements to create a comfortable and safe space for guests, respond to the smallest comments and nuances for uncompromising quality and living happy moments of life of our valued customers. This premium project includes 3 17-storey bright apartment buildings with apartments of different layouts and areas with spacious terraces. All apartments are built with high quality materials and well planned. The complex has an impressive recreation area with 4 large swimming pools and a beautiful garden, spacious sunny areas with sun loungers, as well as a restaurant and a cozy bar. From here you can enjoy breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea. The perfect place to enjoy a cocktail or coffee. There is also a fitness center and a water sports club on site.

We have thought of everything so that you can buy an apartment in North Cyprus.

Unique solutions:

1.A panoramic swimming pool surrounding the houses, with access to the pool from the first floor terraces

2.Alley of Stars, inspired by the world famous alley in the American city that gave its name, for already planned visits of world celebrities and first-timers, top achievers.

3.Direct access to the beach directly from the territory of the complex

4.Closed parking space for each apartment

5.A real greenhouse for your own vegetable garden at the owners (your own plot with beds under the window!)

6.Direct access to the private beach

Infrastructure and Amenities :

A total of more than 35 infrastructural elements, providing solutions for any issues arising during the stay in these apartments.

Near Girne and Nicosia, a new up-and-coming area with approved government programs for road construction, waterfront. Israeli medical center with a full range of services from routine specialist examinations to invasive interventions, cardiac, pediatric, chemotherapy and plastic surgery clinic with the latest in laser technology and telemedicine.

INFRASTRUCTURE OF THE COMPLEX ♦️

🔸 SPA

🔸 SAUNA AND HAMMAM SEPARATELY FOR MEN AND WOMEN

🔸 GYM

🔸 OUTDOOR POOL

🔸 CHILDREN’S POOL

🔸 KINDERGARTEN

🔸 CHILDREN’S SPORTS GROUNDS

🔸 CLOSED PARKING LOT UNDER EACH APARTMENT

🔸 TERRACES WITH ACCESS TO PRIVATE POOL FROM THE BALCONY

🔸 LAUNGE BAR

🔸 RESTAURANT

🔸 BARBECUE ZONE

🔸 ELECTRIC CAR CHARGERS

🔸 PRIVATE BEACH

♦️КВАДРАТУРА APARTMENTS AND ЦЕНЫ♦️

GARDEN STUDIOS with swimming pool
NET 30 m2
BRUTTO 50 m2
55 000 GBP

1+1 gound with swimming pool
NET 45 m2
65-70 m2
75 000 GBP

Studios 1 and 2 floors
NET 30 m2
50 m2
49 000 GBP

1+1 ground floor studios 1 and 2
NET 45 m2
65-70 m2
68,700 GBP

♦️ПЛАН PAYMENTS ♦️

☝️Бронь-2000 GBP

☝️Первоначальный installment -35%

☝️Далее installment until completion of construction 🤩
